SELECT * FROM course AS c ORDER BY c.course_createtime DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * , SUM(e.`lesson_count`) AS s FROM course AS c,lesson AS e WHERE c.`course_id`=e.`course_id` GROUP BY c.`course_id` ORDER BY s DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT * FROM course AS a WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM course AS b WHERE a.`course_type` = b.`course_type` AND a.`course_createtime` < b.`course_createtime`) < 4 ORDER BY a.`course_type` ASC,a.`course_createtime` DESC;
SELECT * FROM course WHERE course.`course_id` IN (SELECT e.`course_id` FROM look AS l LEFT JOIN lesson AS e ON l.`lesson_id`=e.`lesson_id` WHERE l.`student_id`=#{id} GROUP BY e.`course_id`)
